meanings.definition: So precious that its value cannot be determined
meanings.sent1: Her smile was priceless, lighting up the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact was priceless, holding immense historical significance.
meanings.sent3: Finding a unicorn in your backyard would be as priceless as winning the lottery.
meanings.sent4: His advice was like a priceless gem, guiding me through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The sunset over the ocean was a priceless sight, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
